Webpage of Yohann Le Faou

Welcome to my personal page

I'm a PhD student with CIFRE program at LPSM and at the company Forsides. My PhD advisors are Olivier Lopez (LSTA) and Guillaume Gerber (Forsides).

My fields of research are survival analysis, machine learning for censored data and applications to insurance.

Publications

Preprints

  • Y. Le Faou, O. Lopez (2018). A nonparametric conditional copula model for successive duration times, with application to insurance subscription. Preprint
    [code] • [talk & poster]
  • G. Gerbert, Y. Le Faou, O. Lopez, M. Trupin (2018). The impact of churn on client value in health insurance, evaluation using a random forest under random censoring. Preprint
    [code] • [talk & poster]

Sofwares

  • sword, a R package to fit regression models, and especially Random Forest, to right censored data. See the package repository and the package vignette
